entry.title: OpenSSL 1.0.0p / 1.0.1k incompatible, causes blockchain rejection.
entry.summary: On January 10, 2015, Ivan Jelincic inquired about the vulnerability of openssl1.0.1j, to which a response was given that it is unaffected and concerns CVE-2014-8275. The said vulnerability is listed under the major changes between OpenSSL 1.0.1j and OpenSSL 1.0.1k on the OpenSSL website news section.
